Una de las historias más conocidas y queridas del mundo pero representada en un escenario de acción, ciencia ficción y grandes andanzas.

Para jugar a CAMELOT Trigger solo necesitas una copia de Fate Básico y grandes dosis de aventura. En este Mundo Fate encontrarás:

* La historia mítica del rey Arturo contada desde un entorno de space opera y mechas.
* Nuevas habilidades para representar la ambientación y el comportamiento caballeresco.
* Reglas para diseñar tu propia armadura y entablar combates épicos.
* Estadísticas para poder usar a los propios personajes del mito artúrico y sus armaduras.

¡Reagrupa a todo el sistema solar bajo el estandarte del Rey Arturo!

218747.name: Threshold (Issue 14 - Jan 2017) The Shadowdeep
rpgissuearticle: Adventure Hooks, Red Herrings & the Information Mesh
Koskatep Level 12: Koskatepetl , The Wasted City
The Unknown World Trail map - part II
218747.description:
The Shadowdeep

From the Back Cover:

The Shadowdeep is a vast realm, so vast it contains entire worlds, great nations, lost cultures and incredible secrets. A few brave people, even entire communities, have faced the Shadowdeep and triumphed, some even reaching down to the Hollow World, the land of the red sun, and some instead reaching up from the Hollow World to the strange Outer World of day and night.

Threshold magazine presents in this issue the secrets and the treasures of the Shadowdeep, for you to discover and take. But not all of them, because the Shadowdeep is so vast you could roam it for your entire life, and never return to the worlds of the light.

218748.name: The Magic School Bus Lands on Mars
videogamecompilation: The Magic School Bus Bonus Pack Volume 3
218748.description:
From back of box

Be part of Ms. Frizzle's crew, as you investigate the red planet's amazing surface, hear cool facts about missions to Mars, and see color photographs.

218749.name: The Magic School Bus Volcano Adventure
videogamecompilation: The Magic School Bus Bonus Pack Volume 3
218749.description:
From back of box

Share the excitement with Ms. Frizzle, her class, and their pal Liz as they go on a thrilling volcano adventure. Discover the explosive wonder of these quaking giants and learn about different volcanoes from around the world. Play Operation Rescue, create cool art with the Green Machine, perform zany experiments, and complete fun art projects.

218750.name: The Magic School Bus Whales and Dolphins
videogamecompilation: The Magic School Bus Bonus Pack Volume 3
218750.description:
from back of the box

Have a whale of a time with Ms. Frizzle and her class as you join them on a field trip to the Pacific Ocean. With The Magic School Bus Whales & Dolphins Activity Center, kids ages 6 to 10 experience whales and dolphins up close and personal, and find out where they live, what they eat, and other amazing science facts. There are plenty of activities to keep kids entertained, including art activities, arcade-style games, and science experiments. Kids learn important science concepts through activities hosted by characters from the Magic School Bus TV show. The activities strive for an equal balance of fun and learning, to satisfy kids' desire for fun and parents' desire for education.

218751.name: Zup!
218751.description:
A minimalist abstract puzzle game where you need to get the blue box onto the green platform by blowing up red boxes.

User Summary

218752.name: Zup! 3
218752.description:
More minimalist abstract puzzles with explosions! Nothing has changed from Zup! 2 (which uses a ball rather than a box as in Zup!)

User Summary

218753.name: Tendrils
218753.description:
2 players Black and White

Materials
A hex board having 91 cells, 6 cells per side and a supply of black and white stones

Tendril - a group of connected like color adjacent stones

Object
Player having the largest “Tendril” at endgame wins

Rules of Play
Board starts out empty

Black starts turns alternate

On black's first turn he places one stone, hereafter on a turn players place two stones into empty cells

A stone cannot be placed in a cell which does not have 4 adjacent empty cells

When no more moves are possible, the game ends

Give your creatures the Spawn Points that they deserve! Upgrade your battlefield with these menacing eruptions of teeth and stone.

Contains 12 plastic spawn point miniatures for use with Fireteam Zero.
218760.name: Fireteam Zero: Spawn Point Pack

218761.name: War in the Pacific: 1941-1945
218761.description:
Description from the publisher:

War in the Pacific 1941-1945 allows players to replay the conflict between the Empire of Japan and the Allies in the Pacific Theater of World War II. WIP is a campaign game on a grand strategic scale. Random event cards reflect the major political and technological changes and events which occurred during the War; depots are used to stress the crucial importance of logistics; and there is a mechanic that generally effects simultaneous movement (campaigning). The heart of WIP is the use of Resource Points which players spend to conduct their campaigns. The Japanese player starts with more RPs and is his challenge to use them effectively in the first months and years of the war before the immense resources of the Allies kick in and begin to be felt.

218762.name: Galactic Explorer
218762.description:
Description from the designer:

Galactic Explorer is a traditional roll and move game that is anything but traditional. Players design their ships using parts and technologies to fit their particular strategy. Once their ship is built, its time to start rolling and exploring the galaxy!

There are three types of ship parts, Cargo, Colony, and Engine, and four technology trees that can be used to specialize your ship. At the start of the game players have a budget they spend to build their ship. Each ship part is represented by a different d6 and how far a ship moves each turn depends on the role of the dice.

The goal of the game is to amass the most credits. Players earn money by discovering new locations, delivering miners to worlds they can mine, earning income from their colonists and delivering goods back to the Galactic Hub. Credits can also be used to improve player's ships, either adding more pieces or upgrading technologies.

The board is a spiral galaxy with six arms connecting the center to the outer rim. The number of players determines which arms are used. The game ends when certain parts of the board have been completely discovered or a turn limit, whichever comes first.

218763.name: The Magic School Bus Bonus Pack Volume 3
videogamecompilation: The Magic School Bus Lands on Mars
The Magic School Bus Volcano Adventure
The Magic School Bus Whales and Dolphins
218763.description:
From the Box Cover

This bonus pack of Scholastic's The Magic School Bus software from Microsoft brings the fun and adventure of the award-winning TV and book series to your computer!

218764.name: The Magic School Bus Bonus Pack Volume 2
videogamecompilation: The Magic School Bus Explores in the Age of Dinosaurs
The Magic School Bus Explores Inside The Earth
The Magic School Bus Explores The Solar System
218764.description:
From the Box Cover

This Bonus Pack of Scholastic's The Magic School Bus software from Microsoft brings fun and adventure of the award-winning TV and book series to your computer!

218765.name: Elite: Dangerous Role Playing Game Core Book
218765.description:
UNRELEASED GAME




This game has not been released yet, therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please don't submit images for it unless given direct written permission from the publisher which must be noted in the image caption.




Publisher Blurb

Elite: Dangerous is the modern day incarnation of the seminal space trading game Elite. 30 years after the original game reinvented the way people experienced playing computer games, Elite: Dangerous is ‘The spectacular new multi-player instalment in the seminal open world series of space games that started with Elite’.

Simply put, Elite: Dangerous deserves a role playing game. Not only do the two platforms merge seamlessly together but in the case of Elite: Dangerous it has adopted as one of its core principles the idea of the ‘sandbox’ approach to play. This concept of forging your own path, choosing your own destiny is the foundation on which most role playing games are based and is the key to their success.

218766.name: The Lonely Pony
218766.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Festival of Wishes has been a tradition in the small town of Silvershine for generations. Each year the townsponies gather and tie their wishes around the settlement’s wondrous cherry trees as they blossom. Legend says that any wish made on this great occasion will be granted, yet for a pair of young friends, all has not gone as they expected.

Now, both the cherry trees and the mayor’s daughter, a pony by the name of Glittermane, have fallen ill as the Festival draws near. In desperation, the mayor reaches out to the PCs, pleading with them to find the druid Meadow Lark, who only recently moved away from town. Perhaps she can cure the sickness that has stricken both the trees of his beloved town, and his even more cherished daughter!

The Lonely Pony is a stand-alone, family-friendly Pathfinder Roleplaying Game adventure set in the Ponyfinder campaign setting for 1st level characters.

218767.name: Griffons of Everglow: Dawn of the Fifth Age
218767.description:
From publisher blurb:

Expanding on the lore set out in the Ponyfinder Campaign Setting, Griffons of Everglow is a detailed peek at the workings of the masters of the mountains.

New Sub Races
New Race(Hippogriff)
New Feats
New Spells
New Equipment
Dozens of new places
A map of the griffon lands and their capital city
More lore

218768.name: Decameron
218768.description:
From publisher blurb:

Nadie dijo que fuera sencillo vivir en cualquiera de los reinos medievales de la Península Ibérica, hervidero de traiciones, de heroísmo, de leyendas, de fe y de magia; plaza común en la que se dan la mano la cerrazón y la tolerancia, el odio y el amor, las tinieblas y la luz, los demonios y los ángeles, lo irracional y lo racional. Y nadie lo sabe mejor que los aventureros de Aquelarre, el juego de rol demoníaco medieval.

Decameron es una colección variopinta de fábulas que llevará a los personajes de tus jugadores de un extremo a otro de la Península, una serie de cuentos que narra el ascenso de los marginados y la caída de los opulentos, el poder de los miserables y la debilidad de los poderosos. Entre sus páginas encontrarás:

Nueve aventuras ambientadas en diferentes épocas y localizaciones.
Una campaña en siete partes sobre viajes, libros y el terrible poder de la ambición.
Siete profesiones nuevas, tres criaturas para tus partidas y catorce hechizos nuevos (con reglas para utilizar la Cábala).
Seis personajes pregenerados para empezar a jugar sin perder tiempo.
Y todas las reglas necesarias para poder usar las aventuras con la edición Aquelarre Breviarium.





Translation courtesy of Google:

Nobody said it was easy to live in any of the medieval kingdoms of the Iberian Peninsula, seething with treachery, heroism, legends, faith and magic; common space in which hand shake closure and tolerance, love and hate, darkness and light, demons and angels, the irrational and the rational. And nobody knows that better than adventurers Coven, the demonic medieval role play.

Decameron is a motley collection of fables that take characters from your from one end to another of the Peninsula, a series of stories that chronicles the rise of the marginalized and the fall of the wealthy players, the power of the miserable and weak of the powerful. Among its pages you will find:

Nine adventures set in different times and locations.
A campaign in seven parts on travel, books and the terrible power of ambition.
Seven new professions three creatures for your games and fourteen new spells (with rules for using Kabbalah).
Six pre-generated characters to start playing without wasting time.
And all the rules necessary to use editing adventures Coven Breviarium.

218769.description:
Are you ready to leave the runway and start your flight? You'll find out in Clear for Takeoff.

Each player has a fleet of three airplanes: small, medium, and large. Eight weather cards are shuffled into a small deck, then players are dealt a hand of six cards from a deck that contains cards labeled A, B, C, D, Delay, and Lucky Captain. A runway with sections A, B and C lies in front of all players.

On a turn, a player either discards 1-3 cards or takes an action. An action can be either playing a Delay card on an opponent's plane (which moves that plane back one space on the runway unless the opponent discards a Lucky Captain card) or playing a set of 1-3 cards of the same letter to advance one of the player's planes. If you play a single A, for example, you can place your small plane on the A section of the runway; if you play three As, you can place your large plane on the A. If you play three Cs, you can advance your large plane from B to C.

To take off, you must play 1-3 D cards (depending on the size of the plane), then reveal the top weather card, which might show that one size of plane can't take off. If this size matches the plane trying to go airborne, then you discard the cards to no effect; otherwise, the plane leaves the runway and heads into the sky (a.k.a. the game box). A Lucky Captain card can represent any letter card when played.

At the end of your turn, refill your hand to six cards. The first player to get all three of their plans airborne wins!
218769.name: Clear for Takeoff
boardgamepodcastepisode: 44 – The Family Gamers Podcast – Hosting a Game Night

218770.name: The Seneschal's Master Screen
218770.description:
User summary:

The Seneschal's Master Screen is a game screen accessory for The Riddle of Steel. It is provided as a six-page PDF document intended for print-and-play use as a five pane (single-sided) screen.

218771.name: Rol-It
218771.description:
A fast crossword game.

Each player tries to form a crossword pattern with 10 letter cubes. A dice shaker and sand timer are used to roll the letter cubes and form a crossword pattern using all 10 letter cubes in the time the sand timer empties. If a complete crossword pattern is accomplished before the timer empties, the player may place all the cubes back in the shaker and try again.

After the timer empties the shaker and letter cubes are handed to another player.

Scoring is determined by words and the amount of times a complete pattern is accomplished.

218772.name: Thrash Handbook
218772.description:
User summary:

This sourcebook contains numerous maneuvers, weird powers, and optional rules for the game. Several intermediate versions were produced prior to the standard (Version 1.0) publication.

218773.name: Thrash Sourcebook
218773.description:
From the introduction:

The Thrash Sourcebook is a general-purpose supplement for Thrash, with a bit of information on just about everything. Herein you will find a selection of general game material, plus information on Weird Powers, high tech stuff, and the many styles of kung fu. This is all the result of a many hours of research and even more of brainstorming, and still more of actual writing; hopefully, it will vastly expand the game's repertoire of options for characters and other stuff, and generally has lots of nifty stuff in it.

218774.name: Frankindex! Numbers & Quantities
218774.description:
Description from the publisher:

Professor Frankindex has given the monsters Zeropi and Decamo an impossible assignment; they must feel how many numbers are in the bag. But monster claws are much too big to recognize little objects. That’s why they desperately need your help! The players use their sense of touch to feel how many cubes are in each little bag. Who can whisper the correct eight or more numbers to Zeropi and Decamo? A monstrous numbers and quantities learning game.

218775.description:
Playmat for Avignon: A Clash of Popes or its expansion Avignon: Pilgrimige.

From the website:
These are a great way to enhance your game of Avignon.
The playmats are full color and 18" x 24". They are massive.
218775.name: Avignon: Playmat

218777.name: Save the Ninja Clan
218777.description:
User Summary

Save the Ninja Clan is a platformer.

218778.name: The Han Dynasty Imperial Mausoleums
218778.description:
User Summary

Entering emperor mausoleum of West Han Dynasty of thousands of years, feeling the magnificence and stories of the tomb owner.

218779.name: Aven Colony
218779.description:
Aven Colony involves building a new human city on Aven Prime, an alien planet light-years away from Earth. The player oversees the building, resources and people within the colony. The colony must be built from scratch and over time additional people will arrive. There are many different buildings ranging from tent-like buildings to skyscrapers, and include various categories such as Oxygen creation, Living quarters, Food cultivation and Resource mining. Flying drones are used to build, upgrade, recycle and manage everything in the colony.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aven_Colony Aven Colony]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

218780.name: Super Mario Odyssey
218780.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, and remains in development. Therefore, some of the game information may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception.





New Evolution of Mario Sandbox-Style Gameplay
Mario embarks on a new journey through unknown worlds, running and jumping through huge 3D worlds in the first sandbox-style Mario game since Super Mario 64 and Super Mario Sunshine. Set sail between expansive worlds aboard an airship, and perform all-new actions, such as throwing Mario's cap.

Source: The Publisher Website.

218781.description:
Description from the publisher:

Tigers in the Snow depicts the nail-biting combat during the Battle of the Bulge in our Nations At War series. In December of 1944 Hitler launched Wacht am Rhein (Watch on the Rhine) catching the Allies completely by surprise. The plan was to surprise the Allies with an encirclement attack which would force the allies into a peace treaty with terms favorable for the Axis. The end result would what would be the last German offensive of World War 2.
Designed and developed by veteran Sean Druelinger, Tigers in the Snow will recreate some of the famous battles fought around Eisenborn Ridge in the north to Bastogne in the south, during the Battle of the Bulge. In the game, you can expect six gorgeous map boards with new terrain. Four counter sheets of 3/4" counters and various player aid cards. Special module rules covering limited fuel, German Commandos, and weather to name a few.
218781.name: Nations at War: Tigers in the Snow

218782.description:
Description from the publisher:

It’s the fall of 1942, and the fight for Stalingrad is in full swing. In Victory Stalingrad, you will command either German and Soviet forces to recreate some of the most bloodiest battles of World War 2. Victory Stalingrad will take Nations at War fans into and around Stalingrad. Victory Stalingrad will feature the drive, and retreat from Stalingrad. This is the 5th core game in the Nations At War series.
We are expecting this game will include 5 to 6 map boards, 4 to 5 counter sheets of 3/4" counters and numerous player aid cards. Stalin’s Triumph uses the newly developed v2.0 Core Rules Edition and also includes our new design your own scenario generator. This will add hours of play to your game.
218782.name: Nations at War: Victory Stalingrad

218783.description: Contains 20 cards to swap with specific cards from The Treachery of Rhudaur Adventure pack encounter deck to raise the difficulty of that scenario to nightmare difficulty.
218783.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Treachery of Rhudaur Nightmare Deck
boardgamefamily: Lord of the Rings: The Card Game (LCG)

218784.description: Contains 20 cards to swap with specific cards from The Battle of Carn Dûm Adventure pack encounter deck to raise the difficulty of that scenario to nightmare difficulty.
218784.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Battle of Carn Dûm Nightmare Deck
boardgamefamily: Lord of the Rings: The Card Game (LCG)

218785.description: Contains 20 cards to swap with specific cards from The Dread Realm Adventure pack encounter deck to raise the difficulty of that scenario to nightmare difficulty.
218785.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Dread Realm Nightmare Deck
boardgamefamily: Lord of the Rings: The Card Game (LCG)

218786.name: Dungeon Mountain
218786.description:
Description from the publisher:

Dungeon Mountain is a tabletop dungeon crawler for two players.

It is published as a play book, containing the rules, a space for custom rules and over 50 game boards.

A free, printable game board template and pocket rule book is also available.

The object of the game is to escape the other player's dungeon.
Each player creates a dungeon on an 8x8 grid. This contains a starting point and exit point. A class system can be used to predict the difficulty of a dungeon allowing for fair play or else to create a handicap for games between players of different experience.

Players place several items throughout the dungeon. These are Big Monsters, Small Monsters, Traps, Hammers and Gems. The position of these items does not change during gameplay.

Combat with Monsters is decided with attack points that are assigned when the monsters are placed.

On a second blank grid the players are given the starting coordinates. Players then navigate their opponents dungeon by calling out directions. Players continue their turn until they attempt a move into a wall or certain items. As they progress the players mark their progress on the grids.

The winner is the first player to exit the dungeon.
Number of lives used, monsters defeated and items collected can also be counted as points.

218787.name: 1-2-Switch
218787.description:
A face-to-face party like no other!
Throw an impromptu party anywhere with anyone thanks to a new play style in which players look at each other—not the screen! Bring the action and fun into the real world as you face off in wild-west duels, cow-milking competitions, a copycat dance-off, and more. Each game takes advantage of the Joy-Con controller features of the Nintendo Switch system in different ways. While the action unfolds off- screen, the audience watches the players themselves instead of the screen. That makes it as hilarious to watch as it is to play – an instant party amplifier!

Features:

Face-to-Face Play – Look at your friends rather than the screen as you compete in a new style of video game party full of fast and fun face-to-face games. Stare down your opponent in a wild-west duel, mimic your opponent's poses in a copycat dance-off, or rally for victory in a heated table tennis face-off.
Anywhere with anyone – Bring fun and surprise to barbecues, house parties, or wherever you travel by using the built-in stand of the Nintendo Switch system. The Nintendo Switch system comes bundled with a pair of Joy-Con controllers, allowing the party to start with just one system and the game for instant multiplayer fun.

Intuitive and simple controls using Joy-Con features – Simple rules make it easy for anyone to play and fun for everyone to watch. Each player holds a single Joy-Con, and different games use different controller features, such as motion control, HD rumble, or the IR Motion Camera.

Source: The Publisher Website.

218788.name: ARMS
218788.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, and remains in development. Therefore, some of the game information may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception.





The first fighting game of its kind!
Choose a fighting champion from around the world, equip your own combination of extendable arms, and then use a mix of button presses and quick hand motions to really take the fight to your opponent. Throw punches and guide them midflight to hit agile fighters, avoid incoming attacks with dashes, or trampoline high into the air to rain down fists from above. Power-up your punches to deal extra damage or curve your fists around obstacles to hit skittish opponents. Fill up your special gauge to dish out devastating combinations and finish them off. Unleash your inner fighter in this unbelievable sporting event!

Fight via simple motion and button controls – Grab onto your Joy-Con with a unique "thumbs-up" grip and use simple motions and button presses to outthink your opponent. Toss and curve punches when you find an opening, and dodge a flurry of incoming attacks. It's fast-paced fun for everyone!
Select from a variety of fighters – Select from brand-new fighting superstars like Ribbon Girl, Master Mummy, and more! Each fighter has their own special attributes to learn and master.
Fight in arenas with unique obstacles – Throw punches around (or through) mysterious liquid-filled columns in a spooky laboratory, or in certain arenas, toss fighters onto trampolines for epic aerial skirmishes.
Choose your arms carefully – Each weapon has its own strength. Some are slow and do tons of damage, while others are fast as lighting, but will only serve to set up larger combinations. It's up to you to mix and match your arms to fit your play style.

Source: The Publisher Website.

218789.name: Snipperclips - Cut it out, together!
218789.description:
Cut paper characters into new shapes to solve dynamic puzzles and play activities in a wonderfully creative and imaginative world!

Features:

Work together with friends to cut paper characters into new shapes and solve puzzles – Communicate and cooperate (or not) and move the paper characters on the screen. Get creative and cut shapes out of each other to interact with the environment, move objects, and solve puzzles
Dynamic puzzles full of ever-changing gameplay – Use your imagination to solve puzzles of many different types in fun and interesting ways
Three different types of modes – Solve basic and advanced puzzles by yourself or with a friend in the main game. Then, work together as a team and solve up to 2-4 player dynamic puzzles or compete against each other in activities!

Source: The Publisher Website.

218790.name: Dragon Quest Heroes II
videogamecompilation: Dragon Quest Heroes I·II
218790.description:
DRAGON QUEST HEROES II is a hack-and-slash, field-roaming Action RPG that sends players on a new adventure to restore order in a once peaceful world filled with hordes of monsters and battles of epic proportions. Up to 4 players can band together in cooperative multiplayer to conquer swarms of enemies and defeat challenging boss monsters. There is also a cast of many playable characters each with unique moves and abilities – including a host of familiar faces from the DRAGON QUEST® series and four brand new heroes that must team up to defeat an unknown threat looming over the Seven Realms!

Source: The Publisher Website.

218791.description:
Description from the publisher:

The Exosuit Commander Pack adds 30 super-sized (55 mm tall) Exosuit miniatures to the Anachrony base box, plus the Pioneers of New Earth expansion, and the Guardians of the Council module.

Upgrade your Exosuit tokens to 24 detailed, super-sized miniatures, with a designated cockpit slit for your workers.

The Guardians of the Council adds 6 new Exosuit minis and a whole new module to Anachrony. You may also use the Guardians as the Chronobot's own Exosuit army - or an alternative to yours!

With the Pioneers of New Earth Module, you can upgrade your Exosuits to explore the vast and dangerous Outback. Enhance your Exosuit model with resources or even Breakthroughs, and use the new Adventure action space to uncover secrets of the past, confront hostile lifeforms, and more.

You'll even be able to use your Exosuit's power against your opponents in the race for the best Action spots.
218791.name: Anachrony: Exosuit Commander Pack

218793.name: Super Bomberman R
218793.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, and remains in development. Therefore, some of the game information may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception.




GAME DETAILS
Since its release in 1985, Bomberman has been a familiar party-battle game for many years. Now, Bomberman is coming back as "SUPER BOMBERMAN R" to Nintendo Switch.

In SUPER BOMBERMAN R, the simple rule remains the same: operate the main character (Bomberman), place bombs, and battle with enemies and rivals, but it's coming back in a modern style with 3D stages and photo-real graphics. You can enjoy battles with rivals from all over the world.

There is "Battle" mode for maximum of 8 players, and single play "Story" mode (cooperative play for 2 players is possible as well) where players clear each stage one by one, with a big volume of 50 stages. Also, there is a new rule where the condition to clear the stage is not just by wiping out all the enemies. This simple but strategic game with new rules and 3D stages is fun for everyone, from children to adults.

Features:

Bomberman is back with the same game system and controllability with a fresh take on a classic title
Photo-real graphics
Bomberman's siblings and well-known enemies are back with rich personality
3D stages with dynamic environments
Battle mode for maximum of 8 players, local connection battles, and online battles
Enriched story with all-star voice actors

Source: The Publisher Website.

218794.name: Grovemaker
218794.description:
From publisher blurb:

Deadly Gardens is a series of short PDF documents that each feature a brand new plant monster to use in your Pathfinder Roleplaying Game or OGL campaigns. In addition to a new monster, each volume will also feature supplemental material based around the natural wilderness theme.

In this volume:

Grovemaker CR 10
7 New Magic Items: Burrowcorn, Fungus Shield, Gloves of the Wombat, Petrified Wood Club, Treantseed, Wild Charm, Wood Mask
1 Armor Special Ability: Woodland
1 Natural Item: Grovemaker Sap

218795.name: Kappa
218795.description:
From publisher blurb:

Ruin race for use with Castles & Crusades.

218796.name: Primal Characters
218796.description:
From publisher blurb:

Take Your Game To The Next Level!

Introducing “Alternate Paths: Primal Characters”. This book is designed with the very experienced player in mind as it presents alternate rules and classes that are more suited to their needs.

Overview:

Civilized vs uncivilized subsystem characters
A super simple chaotic monk archetype (the "wild ascetic")
A section on how to do environmental encounters ("man vs nature")
A section on how to use different types of enemies in a primal style game as well as some narrative hooks and suggested enemy types for them.
A pantheon of gods worshiped by animals and rules for humanoid species to worship them.
11 new general feats and 5 class specific support feats. There are also 12 additional racial feats spread across the racial section for a grand total of 28 new feats!




New Base Classes:

Automancer: A very primal "muscle mage" that has Strength based 6-level casting, a unique precasting mechanic, the ability to cast "fist", and so much more! They are medium BAB (+15) but end up hitting like a front line character due to some of their mechanics.
Warmonger: A totemic tribal warleader who forms a sort of limited spiritual hivemind called a "pahg" that grants bonuses to allies, can invite totems of psychological aspects (ego, anima/animus, panic, etc) into their group. They stand up as solid martial characters in their own right as well with a unique suite of "triumphs" that are granted to the warmonger himself.
Elemental Host: Psychic warrior-shamans who have merged their spirit with primal forces. They are often shadowed by their bonded spirit or have them cohabitate in their body until times of great need. They can even "fuse" with their elemental spirit- gaining tremendous power. They are full BAB, 4-level, casters with a lot of fun blasting options in there too.




New Races:

Bandar: Fierce, centaur-proportioned, bandersnatch-folk. Also included are 4 racial feats.
Hottah: Fierce, menacing, stoic, moosefolk who care nothing for the laws of others.
Jaegerhund: Idealized trackers born of magically induced tampering, jaegerhund are born and raised for the thrill of the hunt. Jaegerhund are hunters gifted with extraordinarily keen senses, able to peer into spectrums of light normally unseen. Also include 4 racial traits.
Manameg: Manameg (Mana-meg) are long-lived, enormous, permanently joyful, naive, carefree whale-folk who wouldn’t know a trap if someone sent them a letter about it three weeks in advance.
Utarae: A race of avian humanoids who consume music rather than food. Includes 4 racial feats.
Yetin: A race of (mostly) civilized, diminutive, yeti-folk.

218797.name: The OCTOBER Jeopardy
218797.description:
From publisher blurb:

A lost artifact from another dimension spells trouble for the heroes and opportunity for a group of terrorists. But who wields the artifact's awesome power? Are they seeking to save the city -- or destroy it?

The OCTOBER Jeopardy is a short, system-agnostic adventure designed for a group of Superheroes characters. The adventure can be used with other genres with a little work; suggestions appear in the text. The adventurer also includes several character hooks, writeups of the extremist group OCTOBER, several supervillain NPCs, and suggestions for continued adventures.

218798.name: Feats of Arcane Tradition - Knowledge Esoterica
218798.description:
From publisher blurb:

This Issue introduces over fifty new feats based upon the powers granted by the traditional schools of magic. Two new Advanced Rogue Talents are thrown in for good measure. Includes feat description matrix broken down by arcane school for ease of use.

218799.name: Dragonmarch Keep (System Neutral Edition)
218799.description:
From publisher blurb:

A lonely edifice built atop a rocky crag at the edge of civilisation, Dragonmarch Keep guard over the borders of three formerly warring kingdoms. Men and women of noble birth from three kingdoms serve at the keep in a show of unity. They push back the raiders and marauders emerging from the wastelands and strength the bonds of friendship between the three kingdoms. While the keep’s walls provide formidable protection, the surrounding farms are open to attack, usually in retaliation for a recent foray by the garrison. Dragonmarch Keep is, thus, a place of great adventure and great danger. Here, those of stout heart willing to stand against the forces of evil and chaos are in high demand.

218800.name: Dragonmarch Keep (Pathfinder)
218800.description:
From publisher blurb:

A lonely edifice built atop a rocky crag at the edge of civilisation, Dragonmarch Keep guard over the borders of three formerly warring kingdoms. Men and women of noble birth from three kingdoms serve at the keep in a show of unity. They push back the raiders and marauders emerging from the wastelands and strength the bonds of friendship between the three kingdoms. While the keep’s walls provide formidable protection, the surrounding farms are open to attack, usually in retaliation for a recent foray by the garrison. Dragonmarch Keep is, thus, a place of great adventure and great danger. Here, those of stout heart willing to stand against the forces of evil and chaos are in high demand.

218801.name: Dragonmarch Keep (5E)
218801.description:
From publisher blurb:

A lonely edifice built atop a rocky crag at the edge of civilisation, Dragonmarch Keep guard over the borders of three formerly warring kingdoms. Men and women of noble birth from three kingdoms serve at the keep in a show of unity. They push back the raiders and marauders emerging from the wastelands and strength the bonds of friendship between the three kingdoms. While the keep’s walls provide formidable protection, the surrounding farms are open to attack, usually in retaliation for a recent foray by the garrison. Dragonmarch Keep is, thus, a place of great adventure and great danger. Here, those of stout heart willing to stand against the forces of evil and chaos are in high demand.

218802.name: The Beast of Brookhayven
218802.description:
From publisher blurb:

==Brookhayven Needs Heroes
Will You Answer The Call To Adventure?

Our team of DeepDark Designers is excited to bring you The Beast of Brookhayven, our latest offering hot off the digital presses for use with the 5e OGL ruleset and the materials that can be found for free online in SRD 5.1. Within this 34-page adventure module, you'll find the town of Brookhayven. An usually quiet, backwater town that's currently gripped in the throes of fear and superstition. A terrible monster, known only as The Beast, has made the farmsteads and landholdings that surround the settlement its hunting grounds - and Brookhayven has seen an influx of refuges seeking shelter from the nightmarish monster as a result. However, despite the far-reaching consequences of its sinister presence, not all that much is known about The Beast. It falls to the PCs to investigate the nefarious being, learn more of its true nature, hunt it down, and, ultimately, slay it; all while contending with a terrified populace and a baron whose given himself over to madness, as well as discovering the true nature of a mysterious figure rumoured to be working alongside The Beast. All in a day's work.

The Beast of Brookhayven provides adventuring materials for a 3rd-level party of 3-5 PCs and should see them to 4th-level by its conclusion. It offers optional and modular content, numerous suggestions for expanding on the adventure and really making it your own, and enough materials for 2-6 sessions, depending on how rust your players are at monster slaying. The Beast of Brookhayven provides a standalone experience that doesn't require any other adventures or a lot exposition to make sense of its narrative, although it also pressents an opportunity to be combined with another upcoming adventure by DeepDark Designs that's being developed for PCs of 1st to 3rd-level; Woes of the Whispering Tree. Additionally, The Beast of Brookhayven is also suitable for use with most fantasy settings and makes few assumptions on the part of the game master.

218803.name: Dancing in the Ruins
218803.description:
From publisher blurb:

A Godless adventure for Novice Characters!

The Grand Fleet of the Party King has come to town, promising a life of plenty and unlimited pleasures for those permitted to join. But from all the desperate petitioners, the Party King takes only a lucky few. And even these soon find that life in the Grand Fleet holds more terror than pleasure, as plenty in post-Cataclysm comes at a high price.

Dancing in the Ruins is an adventure for novice characters. In it, they seek to unravel the mystery of the Grand Fleet after the Party King’s ship breaks down. The group completes the adventure after they bring answers back to the waiting masses.

This adventure was written for use with Godless: A World of Fire and Blood, which presents a post-apocalyptic setting for Shadow of the Demon Lord. You can run this adventure as a sequel to In a Pig’s Eye or to Last One Standing, or after some other starting or novice adventure. If you want to run this adventure in Urth or a different setting, you might have to make some modifications to fit the story into your world.

218804.name: Steamers
218804.description: Steamers is a strategy, combination and development game. Details to come.

218805.name: Spin-a-roo
218805.description:
Description from the publisher:

Spin-a-roo is a fun, fast-paced sorting and counting game with two ways to play! Early learners will enjoy the sorting game - a race to match the most numbers and colors on their card! Advanced learners will love the counting game- a race to collect the most tokens by counting up and down from one to ten! With a device that makes colorful tokens appear like magic, Spin-a-roo keeps young learners excited about practicing their sorting and counting skills. There are two ways to play:


The Sorting Game (Green Side)*


The goal is to collect the most Tokens by making color and number matches on your card. A player is chosen to turn the Spinner Handle and fill all seven slots in the Spinner Tray. The chosen player should crank the handle around in a circle until it is back on the starting position. When any player sees a token that matches any color or number on his/her card, he/she calls out the number, takes the token, and places it on the matching space on his/her card. When no player can make a match, or the seven slots in the tray are empty, the next player (moving clockwise) cranks the handle a full turn to reload the slots. When there are no tokens left in the spinner handle and no more matches can be made by any player, players stack all the tokens they have collected. If you are the player with the tallest stack--YOU WIN!


Counting Game (Purple Side)*


The goal is to collect the most tokens by counting up and down from one to ten! A player is chosen to turn the handle and fill all seven slots in the spinner tray. They should crank the handle around in a circle one full turn until it is back on the starting position. When any player sees a token that comes before or after any number on his/her card, he/she calls out the number, takes the token, and places it on the correct space on his/her card. Any number may be placed on the "WILD" space to start. When no player can make a match, or the seven slots in the Tray are empty, the next player (moving clockwise) cranks the handle a full turn to reload the slots. If your stack reaches 10, clear that stack and start over. The tokens that you have cleared will be counted toward your total points at the end of the round. When there are no Tokens left in the Spinner Handle and no more matches can be made by any player, players stack all the Tokens they have collected. If you are the player with the tallest stack--YOU WIN!

218806.name: No Peace with Kobolds: The Duergar Slave Pits
218806.description:
From the introduction:

Survivors of the attacks on Greenest attempted to establish a new village far from the clutches of the Dragon Cult. Little did they know that their new home was located next to a new entrance into the Underdark. An uneasy truce is then threatened when the kobold leader Kignos, along with the entire town council of Greyrun, is taken prisoner by Duergar slavers. The soon to be signed peace treaty is put to the test when kobolds threaten to attack.

A 4-6-hour adventure for 5th-6th level characters.

218808.name: The Inner Sanctum
218808.description:
From the introduction:

This is a single encounter and is intended to occur inside a standard-to-large room in a castle or other such building as part of a larger adventure.

For 4-6 characters, levels 4-5.

218809.name: The Ancient Heroes
218809.description:
From the introduction:

Nine hundred and ninety nine years ago, 5 heroes defeated a terrible emperor and declared a prophecy for one thousand years of peace. Now, the world holds its breath as the millennium draws to a close. Can a new group of heroes take up the mantle of the ancients and continue the reign of peace?

User summary:

This item contains introductory campaign information and initial adventure.

218810.name: The Wedding and the War
218810.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Wedding and the War is a short adventure for 3 to 5 characters, level 1-3.

Lord Figor Durmham, in an attempt to appease their elvish neighbors, has betrothed his son, Young Lord Bell Durnam, to wed the lady Veinier, a Princess of the elvish alliances. The city is in a flurry, preparing for the wedding, and the streets run full with merchants, mead, and merriment.

But there is trouble lurking, especially when the princess is taken in the night just before the wedding. Can these heroes hope to save her from this unknown enemy? If they fail, it could well mean war!

218811.name: The Wild Waste
218811.description:
Publisher's blurb:

This is a campaign module which includes all the resources needed to run your very own nuclear wasteland sandbox adventures. Part One consists of three major settlements in the Wild Waste region, and one major event location, all fully detailed and mapped.

But what's a sandbox without adventure? A variety of random tables have also been included to make sure the mission board stays full, and there's always rewards to be had.

Several locations are fully mapped, and the notable characters are described in detail. A breakdown of amenities available has been included for each location, as well as an appropriate bounty or encounter table.

User summary:

Distributed as a 14-page PDF, three JPG map files, and two PNG map files.

218812.name: Van Gogh Walks into a Bar
218812.description:
Description from the publisher:

It's the XIX century and famous Vincent Willem Van Gogh is up to party. Players will define his movement from bar to bar and will try to make him pass through their food stands to earn points. A game created in México during the Global Game Jam 2017.

During the set up, each player will place 6 food stands on the map, which is compounded by 3 sectors of 5 tiles x 6 tiles. Then, players will take turns to define 15 of Van Gogh's erratic movements. Each round, one of the players will play secretly so the other players won't know for sure where Van Gogh is located.

Players can get points if Van Gogh passes through one of their Food Stands or if Van Gogh wavelike movement matches one of the Path Cards that the players have. If Van Gogh would leave the table, players may lose points.

The game ends after each player had the chance to play secretly during a round. The player with the most points wins.

218813.name: Fall Grün
218813.description:
September 30, 1938. British Prime Minister leaves Munich with no agreement and no piece of paper to wave at a adoring crowd. In Prague, President Benes meets with his government and the decision to resist is made.

This game covers a hypothetical invasion of Czechoslovakia in October of 1938 after a failed meeting in München.
The Game OB's has all forces present in Oct of 38 plus those that appeared up until Dec of 38.

Contents:
560 counters
2 maps
Rulebook

218814.name: 7s 11s: A Fast Paced Dice Game of Chance & Risk Taking
218814.description:
Description from the publisher:

7s 11s is a dice scoring game where players take turns rolling three dice to make combinations that add to 7 or 11. A player's roll determines who contributes chips to the pot. Players take chances to improve their roll as they try to accumulate 100 or more points while avoiding the unlucky "triple", the same number on all three dice. Win the game and the chips are yours!

218818.name: A Bakers Denizen
218818.description:
From the publishers blurb:

In the heart of Elbion, the city of Mages & Sages, a new bakery is spreading joy and icing to the local residents. The long-time baker Horthron Delb thinks something smells rotten in Ystala Tremain's ovens, but the people of Elbion just keep going back for the Sticky Icky Buns and the Sugared Orc Ears. The old baker is willing to pay cold, hard cash for someone to end her reign as the new Queen of Quick Bread.

A short adventure for a group of adventurers from 3rd-5th level, this module can be used as a great interlude in any city or town layover. Is the party heading back to town to ressuply, then it's a great time for this short but intense series of encounters.

New Magic Items!!

Art By Deven Rue and a blast from the past from Russ Nicholson!!

Maps courstesy of the always-generous and amazing Dyson Logos!

This product is for the Labyrinth Lord Game System, but can be used with most any OSR Product!

218819.name: Fate Foretold
218819.description:
Description from the publisher:

Fate Foretold is a tarot-inspired strategy card game where players race against one another to take control of Fate itself. Fate Foretold is honed and crafted to inspire hours of fun and epic gameplay for you and your friends. Gather around the table and take a turn at tempting fate. Use your wits and all the luck you can gather to make it through victorious! Pledge allegiance to kings, gain a spell from a witch, heed warnings in constellations, and use the power of the Four Horses of the Apocalypse to bring ruin to your enemies and emerge as the victor! Fate Foretold is a brilliantly illustrated creator-owned card game designed for 2 to 6 people.

218820.name: StoryCards: Die drei ??? – Buch der Finsternis
218820.description: StoryCards: Die drei ??? – Buch der Finsternis is a storytelling game of sorts in which a player or team is confronted by a situation that presents them with two options for a journey. Which way should they go to solve the mystery? Once they choose, they lay down the card, then search for the appropriately numbered card that they chose. The more cards they lay down, the more they score. If a card is no longer available, however, then the game ends and the detective trio has failed.

218821.name: StoryCards: Die drei ??? Kids – Spuk im Schloss
218821.description: StoryCards: Die drei ??? Kids – Spuk im Schloss is a storytelling game of sorts in which a player or team is confronted by a situation that presents them with two options for a journey. Which way should they go to solve the mystery? Once they choose, they lay down the card, then search for the appropriately numbered card that they chose. The more cards they lay down, the more they score. If a card is no longer available, however, then the game ends and the detective trio has failed.

218822.name: StoryCards: Die Drei !!! – Labyrinth der Spiegel
218822.description: StoryCards: Die Drei !!! – Labyrinth der Spiegel is a storytelling game of sorts in which a player or team is confronted by a situation that presents them with two options for a journey. Which way should they go to solve the mystery? Once they choose, they lay down the card, then search for the appropriately numbered card that they chose. The more cards they lay down, the more they score. If a card is no longer available, however, then the game ends and the detective trio has failed.

218823.name: Sokieba
218823.description: Try to score in Sokieba by throwing five soft colorful dice at the white target dice, which are placed two to five meters away from the throwers. You'll score based on the numbers indicated on the die you hit and the die you threw, so throw accurately and hope for the best!

218824.name: Game of Quotes – Verrückte Zitate
218824.description:
"For each complex problem, there is an answer that is clear, simple, and false." —Donald Trump
"The proletarians have nothing to lose but their chains." —Heidi Klum

These are but two of the quotations that you'll find in Game of Quotes, but it's up to you to determine who didn't say them. In a round, each player chooses a quote, then attributes it to an incorrect source. Humorous combinations are rewarded by other players, and whoever scores the most wins.

218825.name: Feuerwehrmann Sam: Wasser marsch!
218825.description: In Feuerwehrmann Sam: Wasser marsch!, based on the television character "Feuerwehrmann Sam", players need to mend the broken firehose in order to save the inhabitants of Pontypandy. To do this, though, they need to find the matching parts that lie hidden underneath the firetruck Jupiter, and whoever finds the most matches wins.

218826.name: Tianxia: War, Iron & Stone
218826.description:
(publisher blurb)

War rages in the Icy North of Tianxia!

Tianxia: Blood, Silk & Jade brought Kung Fu to the Fate Core System... now Tianxia: War, Iron & Stone brings Mass Combat to the world of Tianxia!

The Lands of the Ice and Snow

Tianxia: War, Iron & Stone expands the world of Tianxia, detailing the two Northernmost povinces: Huangzhou and Dongzhou. Discover the Great Wall, Ghost Song Forest, Emperor’s Ferry, and more!

When two tribes go to war

In a world where kung fu is king, even wuxia heroes sometimes face battles too large to fight alone. Mike Olson’s martial-arts-infused mass combat rules add a new dimension to the world of Tianxia!

Friends, foes, and Faultless Wu

Within these pages you will encounter many new faces from the world of Tianxia. From Grandmaster Faultless Wu of the Three Mountains School, to Frozen Flower, snow maiden of the North. Prepare to encounter many new, iconic characters who will breathe new life into your campaigns.

218827.name: Horizons
218827.description:
(publisher blurb)

Welcome to a unique, intuitive and fast moving fantasy role-playing game. Supremely adaptable, you will be able to recreate your favourite fantasy world or develop your own land of magic, mystery and conflict. Playable with a standard deck of playing cards, a 14 sided dice or nothing at all but pencils, paper and a vivid imagination. Inside you’ll find -

A swift and straightforward storytelling system
Character creation possibilities galore
A huge range of magical styles and traditions supported with dozens of spells
A plethora of customisable combat options
Extensive equipment listings
A wealth of astonishing creatures and personalities
An introductory scenario to get you up and running
Buckets of options and resources to help you tailor Horizons to your own needs and preferences

218828.name: W.O.R.L.D.S.
218828.description:
Description from the publisher (translated):

Preserving life is our priority. Life on earth comes to an end. We must find a new planet capable of welcoming us as a species, allowing us to live in it and to which we can call home. For this, you will serve as Valkyries, arcane-technological ships that have been developed thanks to the discovery of some alien planes. To this day, these ships are already irreproducible. They are our key to the future. They are our last hope.

W.O.R.L.D.S. is a cooperative / competitive card game in which 2 to 4 players will try to be the first to find a planet fit for life, the new cradle of humanity.

In the course of the game, players will pilot their ships, the Valkyries, and will play planetary characteristics on the explored worlds, collaborating to find one that is totally suitable. Now, you have to be the first to achieve it... In addition, you have to get it before the earth loses all hope of being saved.

W.O.R.L.D.S. is composed of 24 world tarot size cards, with the aid of which we will travel with our Valkyries to find a planet where all humanity can be transferred. To check if a planet is fit for life, we will have 60 planetary characteristics counters. And to direct our Valkyrie we will use command panel letters and navigation cubes in order to achieve our goal. But do not lose sight of the fact that the planet Earth does not have much time left and that we have to reach our goal before the asteroids end all trace of life.

Description from the publisher:
Preservar la vida es nuestra prioridad. La vida en la tierra llega a su fin. Debemos encontrar un nuevo planeta capaz de acogernos como especie, que nos permita vivir en él y al que podamos llamar hogar. Para ello, os serviréis de las valquirias, naves arcano-tecnológicas que han sido desarrolladas gracias al descubrimiento de unos planos alienígenas. A día de hoy, estas naves son ya irreproducibles. Son nuestra llave hacia el futuro. Son nuestra última esperanza. 
W.O.R.L.D.S. es un juego de cartas cooperativo/competitivo en el que de 2 a 4 jugadores intentarán ser los primeros en hallar un planeta apto para la vida, la nueva cuna de la humanidad. 
En el transcurso del juego, los jugadores pilotarán sus naves, las valquirias, y jugarán características planetarias sobre los mundos explorados, colaborando para hallar uno que sea totalmente idóneo. Ahora bien, hay que ser el primero en lograrlo... Además, hay que conseguirlo antes de que la tierra pierda toda la esperanza de ser salvada. 
W.O.R.L.D.S. está compuesto por 24 cartas de mundo hallado de tamaño tarot, gracias a las que viajaremos con nuestras valquirias para encontrar un planeta donde se pueda trasladar toda la humanidad. Para poder comprobar si un planeta es apto para la vida, contaremos con 60 fichas de características planetarias. Y para dirigir nuestra valquiria utilizaremos cartas de panel de mando y cubos de navegación para poder conseguir nuestro objetivo. Pero no hay que perder de vista que al planeta tierra no le queda mucho tiempo y que hay que alcanzar nuestro objetivo antes de que los asteroides acaben con todo rastro de vida.
Si queréis saber más sobre W.O.R.L.D.S. seguid atentos. Iremos publicando todos nuestros avances por encontrar un planeta que sea apto para acogernos.

218829.name: ArmaGallant: Decks of Destiny
218829.description:
In ArmaGallant : Decks of Destiny, you create a battle deck to bring into fast-paced RTS battles. From fortifying strategic map points, to unleashing your armies and spells at the right time – it's all about building a great deck and playing an epic game!

The creatures and spells of ArmaGallant belong to one of five elements – Light, Dark, Water, Fire, and Earth – each with their own strengths and play styles. Stick to one or mix-and-match your favorites to create devastating card combos.

So go ahead, draw your cards, cast your deck, and steel yourself for all-out war!

Source: The Game Website.

218832.name: Horizons Quick Start Rules
218832.description:
From publisher blurb:

Welcome to Horizons fantasy roleplaying! This is a short introduction to Horizons for the curious and the neophyte. It is a stripped down, basic resolution summary of the rules with a small selection of core resources. A perfect companion to the main game and an ideal handout for new players.

218833.description:
Description from the publisher:

The Mekasylum, an expansion for the game The World of Smog: Rise of Moloch, introduces new mechanics and brings a new three-mission campaign to Rise of Moloch and comes with:

3 Heroes (Archibald Argrave, Miss Liddel and Little Alice)
3 Agents (Signore Gepetto, Pinokio and Little Orphan Lily)
8 Minion Miniatures (Killer Toys)
Tiles to explore the Unicorn Club
20 Plastic coins (KS bonus)
218833.name: The World of SMOG: Rise of Moloch – The Mekasylum

218834.name: The World of Sulhan
218834.description:
From publisher blurb:

So there we are running for our lives outta cloud land. Rubyn, our Umuthi, s’got all four arms proppin’ open this busted Ordos Gate. It’s spoutin’ rainbow sparkles all over the cave. Sister Fats is trying to heave her huge matriarchal swamp priestess rump through the gap while our Yaelani sentry’s buzzing and fluttering overhead in a dead panic. Yours truly’s toe-to-toe hacking at this massive raging winged monstrosity with a sack of Gold and Floatstone flapping around my waist like a balloon. Then wizard boy jiggles his wee webbed mitts, twirls and gives it the full ‘mighty air elementalist’ treatment. The beast belches in his face and backs off with a killer bout of hiccups. Claims he meant it too! I mean you really head to be there…
…another narrow escape for Jatok the Blade

Explore a deep, rich and truly fantastical world where charm and legend are woven into the very fabric of reality. Exploration, intrigue, conflict and adventure await you at every turn. Opportunity and danger and stalk your path from the soaring solar towers of Imperial Mandar and the demon haunted wastes of war shattered Izahar to the labyrinthine nightmare ziggurats of Horounisal and beyond. Between these covers you’ll discover -

Unique, challenging and extraordinary character races
A vast array of monstrous and magical phenomena
Engrossing backgrounds for a host of major cultures
A coherent and comprehensive cosmography, geography, climate, history and ecology
An adventure packed introductory campaign setting
A collection of detailed regional maps
More fun than you can poke a stick at!




Sulhan is a unique Fantasy setting written for the Horizons fantasy role-playing game but easily adaptable to other rules systems..

218835.name: The Monster from the Other Side
218835.description:
From publisher blurb:

A scream cuts through the night. As the group looks out the windows at the small inn, they see a teenager carried away by a huge bat! What was supposed to be a calm night in a small town, turns into a monster-mystery where everyone seems to owe everyone else something...

The Monster from the Other Side is the first official adventure specially written for the table-top/roleplaying game Drudge!

The adventure takes place in a small un-named town, somewhere in Europe during 1901. Time and place is easily changed, and even the genre can be tweaked.

A small horror/mystery adventure for a 3-4 person strong group. Both table-top and roleplaying sessions are incorporated in the adventure, taking all of Drudge!'s rules into effect.

The Monster from the Other Side is a fun, quick and interesting adventure which can easily be expanded.

218836.name: Tianxia Arcana for the Deck of Fate
218836.description:
From publisher blurb:

Bring Tianxia: Blood, Silk & Jade to your Deck of Fate!

We are proud to present these new cards designed for use with Evil Hat's Deck of Fate! Designed by Daniel Solis and using art by Tianxia: Blood, Silk & Jade artist Denise Jones, these gorgeous cards will help reinforce that "Wuxia" flavor Tianxia brings to your Fate games. We licensed the back of the cards directly from Evil Hat, so they'll shuffle seamlessly into your Deck of Fate.

Included, you'll find...

The Tianxia Accelerated Arcana: A six-card deck, with each card representing one of the six approaches from Fate Accelerated Edition. These cards now show off the six sample Wuxia heroes from Tianxia: Blood, Silk & Jade to keep you "in the moment" when playing a Tianxia game!

The Tianxia Core Arcana: This nine-card deck includes a new set of arcana based around Kung Fu-themed virtues written by Jack Norris! All new aspect suggestions and amazing art from Denise Jones help illustrate the themes of each virtue.

Replace your existing Arcana, or add the Tianxia Arcana to your deck, it's your choice! We hope you'll enjoy this fun, attractive twist to the Deck of Fate!

218837.name: Tukram's Tomb
218837.description:
From the introduction:

The...village is abandoned, and within one hour walks from the tomb. There is not much left: the wooden houses have rotten and collapsed, and only a few stone buildings still sort of stand. There’s nothing to loot, there’s no food, no tools, no riches. Centuries have passed since when the village was abandoned, and anything value has been already taken by others.

User summary:

Distributed as the PDF scenario and a JPG map file.

218838.name: Cheese, Please!
218838.description:
Be the first to build an awesome sandwich. But beware of the mice, they want your cheese!

Each player has a sandwich with six ingredients they need to collect to complete the sandwich. Players start with three random ingredients and then on each turn, they can either choose a random ingredient from the pile in the center or they can ask another player if they have a certain ingredient. If you draw an ingredient, check to see if you can add it to your sandwich, if not put it behind your fridge. If you draw a mouse, it eats a piece of cheese from your sandwich(if you have one). The mouse is then removed from the game and the cheese goes back in the center pile.

Play continues until someone finished their sandwich.

218839.name: The Powerpuff Girls: Saving Townsville Before Bedtime!
218839.description:
Watch out! Townsville has been taken over by villains and only the Powerpuff Girls can help!

This is a cooperative game where the players will work together to move the Powerpuff girls around the board to uncover villains to fight. Each Powerpuff Girl can fight alone (using the dice with erasable sides) or can work together to fight stronger villains. But after each turn, time will pass and the professor will move along the time track (leading to bedtime). Defeat 5 villains, including Mojo Jojo, before bedtime and you win!

218841.name: Temple of the Sun God
218841.description:
Description from the designer:

An abstract game for 2 players. Players decide to either act as the Spirit of the Sun God or as Noble Explorers mistaken for Grave Robbers. While the Explorers work to find each other, the Spirit works to bring down the temple upon them.

Each turn consists of the two players selecting a certain number of spirit stones in secret. After the selection is complete the combined number of spirit stones of the two players determines the action for the turn.

The goal of the game is to escape if you are the Explorers, or stop the escape if you are the Spirits.

218842.description:
Description from the desinger:

Yukon Salon is a creative, fast-paced card game for 2-4 players competing to be the best stylist in the Yukon by styling hairdos for Grizzly Bears and beards for Lumberjacks.

Each client that you style rewards you with a combination of points to win the game and abilities and bonuses to help attempt riskier styles on more difficult clients.

Sway the clients into choosing your style by making outrageous, unique claims and press your luck to earn the right mix of points and rewards.
218842.name: Yukon Salon

218844.description: The Tesla Squad of the Steel Guard is one of the most feared combat unit on the planet. Nobody ever faced them that wasn’t unchanged after this experience. In combat it uses some of the most powerful infantry weapons known to man and is equipped with the new version of the Steel Guard armor. The squad is presented here in desert colors, as used in the Middle-East, circa 1947.
218844.name: Dust Tactics: Steel Guard Tesla Squad – "Steel Lightning"

218845.description: The Anti-Tank Squad of the Steel Guard is one of the most feared combat unit on the planet. Nobody ever faced them that wasn’t unchanged after this experience. In combat it uses some of the most powerful infantry weapons known to man and is equipped with the new version of the Steel Guard armor. The squad is presented here in desert colors, as used in the Middle-East, circa 1947.
218845.name: Dust Tactics: Steel Guard Anti-Tank Squad – "Steel Thunderbolt"

218846.description: Steel Guards are some of the most formidable fighters on the planet. Their half-robotic bodies makes them very hard to kill, allowing them to gain incredible combat experience. And among them are a few that are even more formidable: Master Sergeant Guaï-Lo Moloï is one of them. The third human on the planet (and last one alive) to ever be encased in a Steel Guard armor, he has seen action in every part of the World. His armor has been heavily modified to his specifications, making him a fearsome sight on the battlefield.
218846.name: Dust Tactics: Guai-Lo Moloi

218847.description:
The youngest rising star in the SSU, Leytenant (Lieutenant) Eva Koroutchenko is already a legend. She is famous throughout the bloc for her emerald eyes and long hair, every young man in the SSU keeps a picture of her near his heart for good luck and to protect him from harm. Eva is a hell of a pilot who has already scored more than 30 air victories in her short career. Axis pilots on the Eastern Front have already placed a large bounty on her head: they need her down as soon as possible!

Eva flies a unique helicopter modified to her specifications: the Red Star. She is very capable of taking the reins of any other flying vehicle in the bloc, but prefers her helicopter over anything else. Eva and the Red Star are currently stationed outside Baku. From there she flies many specials operations for Spetsnaz forces in the region.
218847.name: Dust Tactics: Red Ace & Red Star

218848.description:
Steel Guards are some of the most formidable fighters on the planet. Their half-robotic bodies makes them very hard to kill, allowing them to gain incredible combat experience. Thanks to their inhuman strength, each one carries weapons a team of three could barely lift.
The Steel Guard Battlegroup contains the following units:

Steel Guard Command Squad
Steel Guard Sniper Squad
Steel Guard Anti-infantry Squad
Steel Guard Assault Squad




Everything you need to start a new glorious Steel Guard Faction Army is included in this Battlegroup!
218848.name: Dust Tactics: Steel Guard Battlegroup

218849.name: Maze of the Mummy
218849.description:
User Summary

Maze of the Mummy is a puzzle game for Commodore 64 with 15 pyramids with many puzzles to explore on the pyramids different floors (in total 255 puzzles). The goal is to find all 15 diamonds, located at the top of the different pyramids.

218850.name: Dragon Quest Heroes I·II
videogamecompilation: Dragon Quest Heroes II
Dragon Quest Heroes: The World Tree's Woe and the Blight Below
218850.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, and remains in development. Therefore, some of the game information may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception.





User SummaryDragon Quest Heroes I·II includes Dragon Quest Heroes I and Dragon Quest Heroes II.

As part of the move to the Switch, the game will include new rumble features, new characters and improvements to DQHI that were implemented in DQHII.

218851.name: Cockroachsalad - the game
218851.description:
User Summary

In this digital implementation of the card game Kakerlakensalat (Cockroach Salad) players are tasked with preparing a salad in a restaurant. Try to get as many ingredients in the bowl, but make sure not to put the wrong ones in!

218852.name: A Normal Lost Phone
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards Excellence in Narrative Honorable Mention
218852.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, and remains in development. Therefore, some of the game information may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception.





A Normal Lost Phone is a game about exploring the intimacy of an unknown person whose phone was found by the player.Features

An immersive and intuitive way of introducing the narrative through a fake smartphone interface.
A game that bridges the gap between reality and fiction by letting players act as themselves. The game asks a simple question: if you close the app but still think about the game, have you truly stopped playing?
A relatable story that helps build empathy with the characters, allowing to explore difficult topics.

Source: The Game Website.

218853.description:
Promotional card offered by "Dice Tower Season 13 Indiegogo".

SCYLLA (Many Headed Sea Monster):

Your Move: If your Worker moves from a space that neighbors an opponent's Worker, you may Force their Worker into the space yours just vacated.
218853.name: Santorini: Scylla

218854.name: Invisible Ink
218854.description: Invisible Ink is a game. More to come from the publisher.

218855.name: Bubble Witch Saga 2
218855.description:
Stella and her cats need your help to fend off the dark spirits that are plaguing their bright and colourful land. Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this new exciting adventure! Win levels and free Witch Country piece by piece.
Take on this epic Saga alone or play with you friends to see who can get the highest score! Bubble Witch Saga 2 is available to play on Facebook and on mobile (iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch and Android devices).
It’s bubble-bouncing magic!

Source: The Game Website.

218856.name: Bubble Witch Saga
218856.description:
Help Luna, Selma and Hazel free the land of dark spirits in this enchanting bubble shooter game. Each level will bewitch you as you strive to get as many bubbles as possible into the cauldrons.

Start your game on Facebook or mobile and continue your saga between platforms – your gameplay will seamlessly sync across all your devices. So you can play Bubble Witch Saga anytime, anywhere – magic!

Source: The Game Website.

218857.name: Bullyparade: Der Film – Das Kartenspiel
218857.description: Bullyparade: Der Film – Das Kartenspiel is a game. More details to follow.

218858.name: Bullyparade: Der Film – Das Brettspiel
218858.description: Bullyparade: Der Film – Das Brettspiel is a game. More to follow.

218859.name: Bubble Witch Saga 3
218859.description:
Work your magic and burst your way across enchanting levels in this spellbinding bubble matcher!

Source: The Game Website.

218860.name: Extinction Crisis
218860.description:
Description from the publisher:

Extinction Crisis is a Co-operative board game for 1-6 players. Working together as a team, players must stabilize the global populations of amphibians, birds, mammals, and reptiles before time runs out or the damage done to the planet’s biodiversity is beyond repair.

Using unique character skills, combined with team strategy and a bit of luck, players travel the globe encountering real-world destruction events and conservation strategies as they try to bring an end to the worldwide Extinction Crisis. The overall health of the global animal populations is tracked on the Population Growth Index (PGI) chart on the board. For victory, each animal population must be “stabilized” by raising its PGI marker above the zero value. The primary method to do this is for a player to successfully complete a Reaction card during their turn. These scientifically accurate cards are a major determining factor towards the team’s overall success.

However, at the start of each player’s turn an Occurrence Card is drawn. These cards guide the story and introduce real-world events and challenges that must be overcome. But be careful… Just when you think you’re in the clear you could be hit with a Destruction Event, causing an entire species to become endangered or a local habitat to be destroyed. Other actions allow players to meet these challenges and progress towards their final objective. Players must also pay attention to the health of the world’s waterways, invertebrates, and plants. Neglect any of the 3 main charts (PGI, IP, and Ocean) for too long and the consequences could be disastrous: a smart team balances the needs of all 3 charts continuously throughout the game to achieve victory.

Extinction Crisis presents players with a daunting task and requires them to find solutions, adapt to challenges, and overcome the very real crisis facing the planet. With only 10 turns each, how will you rise to the occasion?

218861.name: The Little Kid
218861.description:
From the introduction:

You are just a kid, probably less than ten years old, but you don't know for sure; you don't remember your parents, and have nobody to tell you when your birthday was. You've always been a little strange: with your dreams, and things moving around without you touching them, and other weird stuff happening. And you've seen, heard and suffered things a kid should not.

218862.name: The Giant
218862.description:
From the introduction:

Nobody knows why you're so big, maybe your parents were just as big as you are, maybe you're a mutation, or an experiment, but you are really scary big. And big is all you've got: you're not that smart, not very comfortable around other people, and you cannot really take care of yourself.

218863.name: TA‐KE
218863.description: Japan in the late Middle ages. Acting as shoguns, players try to consolidate their power and to expand their influence in the empire. To this end, you select people that you appoint to the emperor's court. But is the person chosen well and are his skills currently useful to the shogun? Only if you use clever tactics, plan ahead, and keep a close eye on your opponent you can assert your position at court and thus win the game.

rpg: A Land of Ice and Blades
218864.name: A Land of Ice and Blades
218864.description:
From the introduction:

A Land Of Ice And Blades is a tabletop Role Playing Game, designed to be played by three up to six people.
...
It’s a game where you play fantasy characters in a land contended by different populations, and where you will try to sway the destiny and perhaps oppose other characters, for your personal gain or maybe to ensure a brighter future to your people. It’s a game of allegiance and betrayal, of violence and seduction, of swords and sorcery.

At the table, every player plays a character, and at turns different players assume the role of the Game Master to frame scenes for others and to facilitate the game.

rpg: A Land of Ice and Blades
218865.name: A Land of Ice and Blades Cultures and Seeds Sheets
218865.description:
User summary:

This document presents several complete cultures and print-and-play cards to use as culture seeds.

rpg: A Land of Ice and Blades
218866.name: A Land of Ice and Blades Map and Locations Cards
218866.description:
User summary:

This document presents numerous full-color cards, intended for print-and-play use during play. It also contains a variety of naming resources and a concise use guide.

rpg: A Land of Ice and Blades
218867.name: A Land of Ice and Blades Moves Reference Sheets
218867.description:
User summary:

These tables are intended as play references for the game master. They do not include the complete rules, but are intended for print-and-play reference use.

rpg: A Land of Ice and Blades
218868.name: A Land of Ice and Blades GM Materials Sheets
218868.description:
User summary:

These pages are intended to be used as play aids by the game master. They are formatted for print-and-play. The document includes:


Player Record Sheet (x2)
NPC Record Sheet
Fronts Sheet
Monsters Sheet

rpg: A Land of Ice and Blades
218869.name: A Land of Ice and Blades Playbooks
218869.description:
User summary:

This document presents numerous playbooks to support the game. They are intended for print-and-play use.

218870.name: The Battle of Polytopia
218870.description:
The Battle of Polytopia
Polytopia is a turn based strategic adventure. It's a game about ruling the world, fighting evil AI tribes, discovering new lands and mastering new technologies.
Auto generated maps make each game a new experience, with unlimited replay value.

Source: The Game Website.

218871.name: Hellenica
218871.description:
n this turn-based tactics RPG, explore a steam-powered ancient Greece as Artemis' bear warrior on a mythological quest of technology and magic. Push, toss, and bounce friend and foe, and use the environment to your advantage. You choose the battles, allies, and plots you encounter.

Source: The Developer Website.

218872.name: Nine
218872.description:
User Summary

You awake in an unknown room.
How did you get here? But, most importantly,
how to get out of this place?

218873.name: Alpacapaca Dash
218873.description:
User Summary

Alpacapaca Dash is an endless runner with lasers and alpacas.

218874.name: WonderWord
218874.description: Wonderword is a game with the aim to guess words formed by other players, starting from the last letter of the word.
